ItemTooltips.stout_shield: Don't get this if you don't expect any physical harrass, get a Gauntlets of Strength instead
ItemTooltips.bfury: Your ulti will also cleave if you get this, consider getting it if you have a Magnus/DS/Enigma etc.
ItemTooltips.armlet: This boosts your survivability, get it after you upgrade your boots
ItemTooltips.yasha: Get this if you need more speed
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Tusk has a low mana pool and needs mana for all of his skills, if you have supports with Arcane Boots, get Phase boots instead
ItemTooltips.orb_of_venom: Cheap item that helps you catch up to people that try to flee after you snowball
